ol.li: Download the -win-pNNN.zip package from the download site.
Extract the downloaded zip file to a temporary folder

taskbody.context: Locate the extracted setup.exe and follow the steps below:

stepresult.p: If an earlier version of is already installed, you will be prompted as shown below:

step.cmd: Click on Yes to uninstall the previous version (recommended), or click on No to proceed without uninstalling the previous version.

result.p: Choosing default options will create the following folder:
The Desktop shortcut will be updated to point to MiramoDesigner.exe in this folder, and the miramo.exe binary (composition engine) is located in the same folder.
The PATH environment variable will be set as shown here.
result.note: If you choose not to uninstall the previous version, both the earlier version and 2.0.0 install folders will be included in the PATH environment variable, but the earlier version (1.6 in the example shown, installed in C:\Program Files\Miramo\MiramoPDF) takes precedence.

postreq.p: If you wish to install multiple concurrent versions of the composition engine, and are publishing using the MiramoPDF DITA-OT plugin, the location of the miramo.exe binary may be configured using the miramopath ant build parameter. See 'Ant build parameters' in the DITA-OT plugin Getting Started Guide for more information.
